summary: Starts Xvfb with 99 display, launches Ubuntu visual server, and then runs an example script

details.comment: Starts Xvfb with 99 display, launches Ubuntu visual server, and then runs an example script
details.content:
xvfb-run -n 99 -f ~/.Xauthority xfce4-session &
sleep 2 && env DISPLAY=:99 python3 visual_server_on_ubuntu.py &
sleep 5 && python3 visual_autoexec_example.py
